b"@ArtThouBored that's great! Very cool to have an awesome job with awesome people. :) Makes it a joy to go into work every day."
b'@ArtThouBored heh. My articles get shared on the Weather Network US website. I even got noticed by NASA last year! ^_^'
b"@ArtThouBored and I'm hoping to cover various conferences and events (rocket launch?) in the US, so I can visit from time to time. :)"
b"@ArtThouBored it was for the best, tho. I'd never have been able to do this job in the States. My work permit wouldn't have allowed for it."
b"@ArtThouBored sounds like you're working with a pretty amazing group of people now, from what you've said on FB. :)"
b"@ArtThouBored yup, really found my niche when I started this science writer gig. It's fun for me, and people tell me I'm good at it. Heh."
